name: Nuke & Juke Touchdown Football
description:
Hut, Hut, Hut. This is your big chance in the big game. Strut your pro football skills or you will be warming up the bench kid! You're the quarterback so run or throw the ball avoiding the rival team.

Get the ball into the end zone and lead your team to victory in this fast paced, outrageously arcade inspired football game. As the quarter back sometimes it feels like it you against dozens, well this time it is. NUKE the ball down the field for an awe inspiring Hail Mary or JUKE around the endless onslaught of rival players while carrying the ball to victory across the goal line.

NUKE & JUKE FOOTBALL

Key Features:
- Simple arcade action
- Pick up and play
- Vivid bold graphics
- Easy to play, difficult to crush the rivals
- Constant free updates with new game play innovations
- Wicked fun!!!!

Already a Fan? Like Nuke & Juke on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for all the latest news
